_instructions: Edit any value below, then run: python build.py. Images reference filenames in the images/ folder.

hero.subtitle: Multi-instrumentalist, composer & producer. Running Studio S, directing Professor of Funk, performing across the Bay.

music.label: Music
music.title: Simonoto Releases
music.subtitle: Original cuts — funk, jazz, electronic, and whatever the groove requests.

albums.title: Simonoto Ch.4
tracks: What is life? ft. Ian Santilliano
Ownway ft. Sheldon Alexander, Clay Xavier

studio.label: Studio S
studio.title: Production & Engineering
studio.subtitle: Professional recording, mixing, and production from Oakland — top-tier custom gear, shaped by years of experience in CJC's exclusive studio program and at Tiny Telephone and Hyde Street Studios.
studio.copy: Every session starts with the music. Whether you need a polished mix, a raw live take, or full production from scratch — I bring musicianship first, engineering second.

services.title: Recording & Tracking
services.desc: Full multi-track sessions. Solo to full band. Hybrid setup - Analog warmth meets modern workflow.

services.title: Mixing & Mastering
services.desc: Release-ready sound. Plugins + custom analog outboard from Pacifico Audio.

services.title: Full Production
services.desc: Arrangement to final master. Expert guidance and humble collaboration on every track.

services.title: Session Musician
services.desc: Guitar, bass, keys, drums, vocals. In-studio or remote. Whatever the project needs.

gear.label: The Rig
gear.title: Studio Gear
gear.story_text: Built around custom analog gear from Pacifico Audio — designed by Cesar Delly, the legendary Oakland builder behind consoles for studios worldwide, including Otis McDonald's. Every preamp, every EQ — hand-built with rare vintage transformers.

items.name: Universal Audio Apollo x8p, x16, x4
MXR Phase 90 phaser · Red Witch Chorus/Trem
Modded Boss DS-1 Distortion · Sonic Research Strobe Tuner
JDI Duplex · Motor City Bass DI · RC20
UAD Complete · Goodhertz · iZotope · Soundtoys · Native Instruments · Sound Labs · Arturia

teaching.label: Professor of Funk
teaching.title: Classes & Education
teaching.intro: Jazz-trained and accredited at California Jazz Conservatory, apprenticed under Otis McDonald. Real stage and studio chops, straight into the classroom. It's all about authentic groove.

classes.title: Groove Ensemble #1
classes.desc: Classic recordings to current cuts — broken down, analyzed, performed. Recording & live shows at Tiny Telephone and Verdi Club.

classes.title: Groove Ensemble #2
classes.desc: What it truly means to move people. Recording and gigging at Hyde Street, Tiny Telephone, Old Skool Cafe.

classes.title: Studio Ensemble #1
classes.desc: World-class studio workflow. Mix in the box, outboard gear, tape. Learn by doing.

events.label: Live
events.title: Upcoming Shows & Events
events.hotties_desc: Unforgettable nights of live music, visual art, and community across the Bay. Every show is different. Every show is a moment.

contact.label: Get In Touch
contact.title: Let's Make Something
contact.heading: What's the vibe?
contact.copy: Studio time, lessons, session work, live bookings, or just connecting. I get back within 24 hours.

items.quote: Simon is easy to work with, quick, professional, and insightful as a producer.  Every project we work together has a spark!
items.name: Tess Posner

items.quote: “Simon met my son on his level  and helped develop his confidence to play live.”
items.name: Caroline Munck

videos.label: Watch

videos.subtitle: Live from the studio and the classroom.
